response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be equally valuable to you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special price of $11,000. We are confident this price reflects both the quality of the product and the opportunity it presents. We look forward to your consideration.", "product_price": 11000}
